[Global Namespace]::​CStartInventory
class CStartInventory {...}

Player start inventory manager

Can be used to modify the player's start inventory during a map

Always check if inventory modification is available before trying to make any changes

Functions
IsAvailable
bool IsAvailable() const

Returns whether inventory modification is available.

Exists
bool Exists(
const string& in szEntry
) const

Returns whether the given entry is present in the inventory.

Set
void Set(
const string& in szItem,
uint uiAmount
)

Set an item in the inventory.

Sets the amount if the item is already in the inventory.

Set
void Set(
const string& in szEntry
)

Set an entry to the inventory.

Add
bool Add(
const string& in szEntry,
uint uiAmount,
bool fAdd = true
)

Add or subtract from an existing value.

Inserts if the value is not already in the inventory.

Remove
bool Remove(
const string& in szEntry
)

Removes an entry from the inventory.

Restock
bool Restock(
const string& in szItem,
uint uiAmount
)

Restocks the inventory with up to uiAmount of the given item.

Does nothing if the current amount already exceeds the given amount.

Limit
bool Limit(
const string& in szItem,
uint uiAmount
)

Limits the inventory content of the given item to at most uiAmount.

Does nothing if there is less than uiAmount in the inventory.

GetAmount
uint GetAmount(
const string& in szEntry
) const

Gets the amount of a given entry.

Returns 0 if the entry doesn't exist.
